```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
source(here("src", "time.R"))
```

```{r Test Hours, Minutes, Seconds to Decimal HOurs, echo=FALSE}
hr <- 20
min <- 24
seconds <- 54
sprintf("20 hours, 24 minutes, and 54 seconds = %f decimal hours", HHdd(hr, min, seconds))

hr <- 20
min <- 44
seconds <- 54
sprintf("20 hours, 44 minutes, and 54 seconds = %f decimal hours", HHdd(hr, min, seconds))
```

```{r Test Decimals Hours to Hours, Minutes, Seconds, echo=FALSE}
decimalhr <- 4.50
c <- HHMMSS(decimalhr)
sprintf("%f decimal hours = %d hours, %d minutes, and %d seconds", decimalhr, c[1], c[2], c[3])

decimalhr <- 4.20
c <- HHMMSS(decimalhr)
sprintf("%f decimal hours = %d hours, %d minutes, and %d seconds", decimalhr, c[1], c[2], c[3])
```
